title: Revenue Growth Model
text:
Business Analysis for Lariat Rent-A-Car

Examined and cleaned historical sales data using Excel (VLookUp, pivot tables and t-tests)
Facilitated exploratory data analysis and assessed by KPI performance.
Developed and presented models that showcased a 40% increase in profits.

title: Twitter Project
text: Project using R and postgreSQL to conduct an analysis on Tweets extracted with R via the Twitter API.

title: Rblogr
text: I created this blog to show how powerful R is, and to feature code vignettes that are tutorial-style. Another reason for making this blog is that I wanted to share what I have learned, and things I wish I had known or realized earlier (such as using GitHub!).
